descriptionNullable:
BANK LOAN REPORT :

Loan ID: Unique identifier for tracking and managing loans, serving as a primary key.

Address State: Indicates borrower location, aiding risk assessment and compliance monitoring.

Employee Length: Provides insights into employment stability, influencing default risk assessment.

Employee Title: Specifies borrower occupation, verifying income sources for tailored loan offers.

Grade: Represents creditworthiness-based risk classification, influencing loan pricing.

Sub Grade: Refines risk assessment within a grade for tailored lending terms.

Home Ownership: Indicates housing status, offering insights into financial stability.

Issue Date: Marks loan origination date for tracking loan aging and managing portfolios.

Last Credit Pull Date: Records last credit report access, aiding credit risk assessment.

Last Payment Date: Tracks payment history, assessing behavior, and projecting future payments.

Loan Status: Indicates current loan state, assisting in risk analysis and provisioning.

Next Payment Date: Estimates the next payment date for cash flow forecasting.

Purpose: Specifies the reason for the loan, enabling segmentation and customization.

Term: Defines loan duration, structuring agreements, and managing maturities.

Verification Status: Indicates if financial information has been verified, assessing data reliability.

Annual Income: Reflects borrower's yearly earnings, determining loan eligibility and creditworthiness.

DTI (Debt-to-Income Ratio): Measures debt burden relative to income, influencing lending decisions.

Installment: Fixed monthly payment for loan repayment, aiding in affordability assessment.

Interest Rate: This represents the annual cost of borrowing, influencing loan pricing.

Loan Amount: Total borrowed sum, determining the size of the loan.
title: Bank Loan
